projectsContent.name: VirusHack
projectsContent.description:
Caring for the critically ill in the digital city
IDEA AND TARGET AUDIENCE:
Provide a personalized service to help organize the care of critically ill people. The target audience of the application is close relatives or caregivers

DECISION:
The solution is to combine in one place the whole complex of the needed information and support functionality to help in the care of critically ill people.

projectsContent.name: WeatherApp
projectsContent.description: Weather App, where you can check weather forecast for week according to you current location or use search input
projectsContent.techInfo: STACK: React(hooks), OpenWeatherAPI, SASS, Redux/saga as a state manager

experienceContent.name: VTB
experienceContent.description: Angular 2+, Typescript. I was working on a project of internal system for bank employees, my responsibilities were: creating new components,update and support existing code, bugfix

experienceContent.name: Elbrus Coding Bootcamp
experienceContent.description: MERN stack. Teaching and helping students to start their path as a developers. My responsibilities were: teaching 60% of time and developing internal apps 40% of time

experienceContent.name: Elbrus Coding Bootcamp
experienceContent.description: My responsibilities: opening campus in SaintPetersburg, hiring staff , teach staff, creating lections for students, developing of campus and searching for partners
